[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@firebase/analytics](./analytics.md) &gt; [GtagConfigParams](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.md) &gt; [cookie\_update](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.cookie_update.md)

## GtagConfigParams.cookie\_update property

If set to true, will update cookies on each page load. Defaults to true. See [Cookies and user identification](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/cookies-user-id)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'cookie_update'?: boolean;
```
